text: Juan Enrique Lira (27 October 1927 - 12 March 2007) was a Chilean sports shooter. He competed at the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Chilean male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Chile Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Santiago
title: Juan Enrique Lira
